name: Croceteria
description:
Oh no! Darcy contaminated all the ingredients for your Home Ec class. Run around the cafeteria and grab food items from other students. It may not be academically honest, but man that extra credit looks tasty. Just beware, the other students are a bit uh... unhinged.

Controls:

WASD: Move
Mouse & Click: Aim & Attack

Made for the Stop Waiting for Godot game jam.
